00117 // two layer module
00118 
00119 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00120 layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::layers_2(module_1_1<Tin,Thid> *l1, Thid *h, module_1_1<Thid,Tout> *l2) {
00121   layer1 = l1;
00122   hidden = h;
00123   layer2 = l2;
00124 }
00125 
00126 // Do nothing. Module doesn't have ownership of sub-modules
00127 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00128 layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::~layers_2() { }
00129 
00130 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00131  void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::fprop(Tin *in, Tout *out) {
00132   layer1->fprop(in, hidden);
00133   layer2->fprop(hidden, out);
00134 }
00135 
00136 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00137  void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::bprop(Tin *in, Tout *out) {
00138   hidden->clear_dx();
00139   layer2->bprop(hidden, out);
00140   layer1->bprop(in, hidden);
00141 }
00142 
00143 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00144  void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::bbprop(Tin *in, Tout *out) {
00145   hidden->clear_ddx();
00146   layer2->bbprop(hidden, out);
00147   layer1->bbprop(in, hidden);
00148 }
00149 
00150 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00151 void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::forget(forget_param &fp) {
00152   layer1->forget(fp);
00153   layer2->forget(fp);
00154 }
00155 
00156 template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00157 void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::normalize() {
00158   layer1->normalize();
00159   layer2->normalize();
00160 }

00164 // N layer module
00165 
00166 template<class T> layers_n<T>::layers_n() {
00167         modules = new  std::vector< module_1_1 <T,T>* >();
00168         hiddens = new std::vector< T* >();
00169         this->own_contents = true;
00170 }
00171 
00172 template<class T> layers_n<T>::layers_n(bool oc) {
00173         modules = new  std::vector< module_1_1 <T,T>* >();
00174         hiddens = new std::vector< T* >();
00175         this->own_contents = oc;
00176 }
00177 
00178 // Clean vectors. Module doesn't have ownership of sub-modules
00179 template<class T> layers_n<T>::~layers_n() {
00180         if (this->own_contents){
00181                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<modules->size(); i++){
00182                         delete (*modules)[i];
00183                 }
00184                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00185                         delete (*hiddens)[i];
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         delete modules;
00189         delete hiddens;
00190 }
00191 
00192 template<class T>
00193 void layers_n<T>::addModule(module_1_1 <T, T>* module, T* hidden) {
00194         if (modules->size() > hiddens->size())
00195                 ylerror("Inconsistency in layers_n, probably you have passed null hidden layer before");
00196 
00197         modules->push_back(module);
00198         if (hidden != NULL)
00199                 hiddens->push_back(hidden);
00200 
00201         if (modules->size() - hiddens->size() > 1)
00202                 ylerror("Inconsistency in layers_n, probably you did not allocate enough hidden states in layers_n");
00203 
00204 }
00205 
00206 template<class T>
00207 void layers_n<T>::fprop(T* in, T* out){
00208         if (modules->empty())
00209                 ylerror("trying to fprop through empty layers_n");
00210 
00211         T* hi = in;
00212         T* ho = in;
00213 
00214         // last will be manual
00215         int niter = modules->size()-1;
00216         for(int i=0; i<niter; i++){
00217                 ho = (*hiddens)[i];
00218                 (*modules)[i]->fprop(hi,ho);
00219                 hi = ho;
00220         }
00221         (*modules)[niter]->fprop(ho,out);
00222 }
00223 
00224 template<class T>
00225 void layers_n<T>::bprop(T* in, T* out){
00226         if (modules->empty())
00227                 ylerror("trying to bprop through empty layers_n");
00228 
00229         // clear hidden states
00230         for (unsigned int i=0; i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00231                 (*hiddens)[i]->clear_dx();
00232         }
00233         T* hi = out;
00234         T* ho = out;
00235 
00236         // last will be manual
00237         int niter = modules->size()-1;
00238         for(int i=niter; i>0; i--){
00239                 hi = (*hiddens)[i-1];
00240                 (*modules)[i]->bprop(hi,ho);
00241                 ho = hi;
00242         }
00243         (*modules)[0]->bprop(in,ho);
00244 }
00245 
00246 template<class T>
00247 void layers_n<T>::bbprop(T* in, T* out){
00248         if (modules->empty())
00249                 ylerror("trying to bbprop through empty layers_n");
00250 
00251         // clear hidden states
00252         for (unsigned int i=0; i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00253                 (*hiddens)[i]->clear_ddx();
00254         }
00255 
00256         T* hi = out;
00257         T* ho = out;
00258 
00259         // last will be manual
00260         int niter = modules->size()-1;
00261         for(int i=niter; i>0; i--){
00262                 hi = (*hiddens)[i-1];
00263                 (*modules)[i]->bbprop(hi,ho);
00264                 ho = hi;
00265         }
00266         (*modules)[0]->bbprop(in,ho);
00267 }
00268 
00269 template<class T>
00270 void layers_n<T>::forget(forget_param_linear& fp){
00271         if (modules->empty())
00272                 ylerror("trying to forget through empty layers_n");
00273 
00274         for(unsigned int i=0; i<modules->size(); i++){
00275                 module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> *tt = (*modules)[i];
00276                 tt->forget(fp);
00277         }
00278 }
00279 
00280 template<class T>
00281 void layers_n<T>::normalize(){
00282         if (modules->empty())
00283                 ylerror("trying to normalize through empty layers_n");
00284 
00285         for(unsigned int i=0; i<modules->size(); i++){
00286                 (*modules)[i]->normalize();
00287         }
00288 }
